page.title: 13EVENTS-PORTPATRICK
page.content: {LIFEBOAT WEEK, 4th - 11th August,1985. Sunday.."Bless the Boat" pierhead service. Pipe Band with dancers. MONDAY.. Deep-sea Angling Contest. Novelty Pram Race. Tuesday. Royal Navy & Royal Marine Static Display.Family Fun Run Dog Training Display.Disco. Wednesday. Annual Golf Competition Sandcastle Competition.R.N.& R.M. Static Display. Greasy Pole contest.Lifeboat an Coastguard combined exercise. Thursday. Coffee Morning.Gymnastic Display.Sailboard Race. Friday.. Fancy Dress Parade.Ceilidh. Raft Races.Disco. Saturday.R.A.F.Static Display.Lifeboat -Helicopter exercise.Barbeque & Bonfire with Pipe Band. Sunday.Stranraer & District Pipe Band.
